QueryHandlers Classes¶

class src.main.python.flaskserv.QueryHandlers.BaseQuery(query)[source]¶

Bases: object

Abstract class off of which to construct query classes for the different databases

Has __call__() defined which uses __getattribute__() calls on sanitised query string to produce appropriate response. The response method should be defined in the inheriting class.

Parameters:query (byte string) – the query request
Returns:json object containing query result
clean_query()[source]¶

Sanitises and converts the query passed in constructor to a python string.

defaultCase()[source]¶

Must be defined in inheriting class.

Should return the default case / error case - i.e. if the query does not match to a known query.

class src.main.python.flaskserv.QueryHandlers.MusicQuery(query)[source]¶

Bases: src.main.python.flaskserv.QueryHandlers.BaseQuery

Handler for interfacing between music database and the web server. Inherits from BaseQuery. Encapsulates Database.MusicDB to make database queries.

Parameters:query (byte string) – the query request
Returns:json object containing query result
defaultCase()[source]¶

Default case is an empty dictionary.

Returns:empty dictionary
getAllSongs()[source]¶

Fetch from database the whole songs table. Looks in environment variable MUSIC_DB_PATH for the database path. Converts the list of tuples from database call into a dictionary.

Returns:dictionary containing the parsed songs table

TODO

keys = ['name', 'artist', 'duration', 'file_path', 'meta_dat']¶

Bases: src.main.python.flaskserv.QueryHandlers.BaseQuery

Handler for interfacing between user database and the web server. Inherits from BaseQuery. Encapsulates Database.UserDB to make database queries.

Parameters:query (byte string) – the query request
Returns:json object containing query result

Default case is an empty dictionary.

Returns:empty dictionary
getAllUsers()[source]¶

Fetch from database the whole users table. Looks in environment variable USER_DB_PATH for the database path. Converts the list of tuples from database call into a dictionary.

Returns:dictionary containing the parsed users table
